name: Falselight
author: BFHNV
desc:
An illusory lantern appears in your hand, shedding illusory light in a 30 foot radius. You and any number of creatures you choose perceive this as magical bright light, removing all shadows and revealing anything invisible. All other creatures perceive it as magical darkness, making it impossible to see in or out of the area.

When cast at a higher tier, the radius increases by 15 feet for every tier above 3.
